# Chapter 4: [Mobile App/Web Control] Control your micro:bit by App inventor 2/Web 

## Example 1: Control P0/P1/P2/other module on/off (WAN command)
123

### Control the micro:bit by PC

### Control the micro:bit by App Inventor
